docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: David M. Eddy and Craig Henderson insist that we must ''determine the truth'' of a treatment's effectiveness through clinical trials before insurers should have to pay for it and health maintenance organizations provide it (''A Cancer Treatment Under a Cloud,'' Op-Ed, April 17, 1999).

headline.main: Patients Are Victims of the Politics of Cancer; Doctors Know Best

docs.abstract: Letter from Dr Robert A Kuschner says terminally ill patients cannot wait for ideal clinical trial to be performed, analyzed and published before insurers pay for it, as advised by David M Eddy and Craig Henderson in their Apr 17 Op-Ed
